Fill the bottom of a double boiler with water until it almost reaches the bottom of the top pan. Bring the water to a boil, then reduce the heat to leave the water simmering. Put the chocolate and butter in the top pan. Stir until both butter and chocolate are smooth. Remove the top pan from the double boiler. Add the raspberry jam and syrup/framboise.
